summary: A group of helpless victims celebrate a birthday on an island estate crawling with killer amphibians, birds, insects, and reptiles.
cast: Ray Milland|Sam Elliott|Joan Van Ark|Adam Roarke|Judy Pace|Lynn Borden|Mae Mercer|David Gilliam|Nicholas Cortland|George Skaff|Lance Taylor Sr.|Hollis Irving|Dale Willingham|Hal Hodges|Carolyn Fitzsimmons|Robert Sanders
title: Ranas
